Our Journey

From our humble beginnings to our current position as regional leader, each step has been marked by innovation.

We continue to invest in technology and talent to serve our clients with excellence.

2019 Founded GKS Logistics

My Role & Mission

As CEO, I lead our strategic vision and drive innovation across all our operations, ensuring we remain at the forefront of African logistics.

Key Responsibilities

  • International strategic partnerships
  • Innovation and business expansion
